actions.recommendation: Bilateral high frequency hearing loss, a full audiogram with the audiologist is recommended to review.
-Prostate screening becomes important after the age of 40. Straining to urinate, waking at night to urinate, dribbling after passing urine & a weaker stream are some signs to look out for.
There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change.
Magnesium, Vitamin D, Omega-3 fatty acids, and Probiotics are recommended.
Bilateral high frequency hearing loss, a full audiogram with the audiologist is recommended to review.
-Prostate screening becomes important after the age of 40. Straining to urinate, waking at night to urinate, dribbling after passing urine & a weaker stream are some signs to look out for.

-Continue annual health screening, pay attention to the conditions that have occurred in your family. -Monitor cholesterol & kidney function closely. -Employ lifestyle habits that benefit your present & future health.
Bilateral high frequency hearing loss, a full audiogram with the audiologist is recommended to review.
-Prostate screening becomes important after the age of 40. Straining to urinate, waking at night to urinate, dribbling after passing urine & a weaker stream are some signs to look out for.
-Monitor uric acid levels & liver enzymes. Supplement Vitamin D to improve your levels.
-Continue keeping active & eating a varied diet.
